src_original: uta nātmany abhiviniṣṭā vihariṣyāmo vyādhimūlaparijñātāvinaḥ /  tenātmasaṃjñāṃ viṣṭhāpya dharmasaṃjñotpādayitavyā /
tgt_original: 既知病本，即除我想及眾生想，當起法想。 應作是念：

src_original: dharmasaṃghāto 'yaṃ kāyaḥ /  dharmā evotpadyamānā utpadyante /  dharmā eva nirudhyamānā nirudhyante /
tgt_original: 但以眾法合成此身，起唯法起、滅唯法滅。 」釋曰： 上以法遣我。

src_original: te ca dharmāḥ parasparaṃ na cetayanti na jānanti /  na ca teṣām utpadyamānānām evaṃ bhavaty utpadyāmaha iti /  na nirudhyamānānām evaṃ bhavati nirudhyāmaha iti /
tgt_original: 次經云「又此法者各不相知，起時不言我起，滅時不言我滅。

src_original: yāpy eṣā dharmasaṃjñā so 'pi viparyāsaḥ /  viparyāsaś ca mahāvyādhiḥ /  vigatavyādhikena ca mayā bhavitavyam /  vyādhiprahāṇāya ca yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
tgt_original: 此法想者亦是顛倒，顛倒者即是大患，我應離之。

src_original: yad idam ahaṃkāramamakāraprahāṇam /
tgt_original: 謂離我我所。

src_original: tac ca katamad ahaṃkāramamakāraprahāṇam,
tgt_original: 云何離我我所？

src_original: yad idaṃ dvayavigamaḥ /
tgt_original: 謂離二法。

src_original: tatra katamo dvayavigamaḥ,
tgt_original: 云何離二法？

src_original: yad idam adhyātmaṃ bahirdhā ca samudācāraḥ /  tatra katamo 'dhyātmaṃ bahirdhā samudācāraḥ,  yad uta samatayācalanatāpracalanatā /
tgt_original: 謂不念內外諸法，行於平等。

src_original: katamā ca samatā /
tgt_original: 云何平等？

src_original: ātmasamatayā ca nirvāṇasamatā /
tgt_original: 謂我等、涅槃等。

src_original: tat kasmād dhetoḥ /
tgt_original: 所以者何？

src_original: avijñaptikaś cādvayapraveśaḥ /
tgt_original: 如是解者，是為入不二法門。

src_original: upalambhaprabhāvitaṃ dvayam /  yan na labhate tan nopalabhate,  tan nāyūhati na niryūhati /  tatra nāyūho na niryūho 'yam advayapraveśaḥ /  tamaḥ prakāśa iti dvayam etat /  tat kasmād dhetoḥ /  tathā hi nirodhasamāpannasya na tamo na prakāśaḥ /  evaṃlakṣaṇāś ca sarvadharmāḥ /
tgt_original: 「樂涅槃不樂世間為二。

src_original: yo 'tra samatāpraveśo 'yam advayapraveśaḥ /  Vkn 8.29 ratnamudrāhasto bodhisatva āha:  nirvāṇe 'bhiratiḥ saṃsāre 'nabhiratir iti dvayam etat /  yasya na nirvāṇe 'bhiratir na saṃsāre 'nabhiratir idam advayam /
tgt_original: 若不樂涅槃、不厭世間，則無有二。

src_original: tat kasmād dhetoḥ /
tgt_original: 所以者何？

src_original: baddhasya hi sato mokṣaḥ prabhāvyate /
tgt_original: 若有縛則有解。

src_original: yo 'tyantam evābaddhaḥ sa kiṃ mokṣaṃ paryeṣiṣyate /  abaddho 'mukto bhikṣur na ratim utpādayati nāratim ayam advayapraveśaḥ /  Vkn 8.30 maṇikūṭarājo bodhisatva āha:
tgt_original: 若本無縛，其誰求解？

src_original: mārgaḥ kumārga iti dvayam etat /  mārgapratipannasya na kumārgaḥ samudācarati /
tgt_original: 無縛無解則無樂厭，是為入不二法門。

src_original: abhijānāmy ahaṃ bhagavan:  anyatamau dvau bhikṣū āpattim āpannau,  tau bhagavataḥ paryapatrapamāṇau bhagavantaṃ nopasaṃkrāmataḥ /  tau yenāhaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntāv upasaṃkrāmya mām etad avocatām /  āvāṃ bhadantopāle āpattim āpannau,
tgt_original: 波離白佛： 「憶念昔時者，有二比丘犯律行，以為恥不敢問佛，來謂我言：

src_original: tāv āvāṃ paryapatrapamāṇau bhagavantam upasaṃkramituṃ notsahāvahe /
tgt_original: 『我等犯律，誠以為恥，不敢問佛。

src_original: utsāhāya āyuṣmann upāle vinodayasvāvayoḥ kaukṛtyaṃ vyutthāpayasvāvām āpatteḥ /
tgt_original: 願解疑悔，得免斯咎。

src_original: dehi bhagavan asmabhyaṃ dharmaprābhṛtaṃ yathā vayaṃ tatra sarvagandhasugandhe lokadhātau gatā bhagavantam anusmarema /
tgt_original: 願賜少法，還於彼土當念如來。

src_original: Vkn 10.16 bhagavān āha:
tgt_original: 」佛告諸菩薩：

src_original: asti kulaputrāḥ kṣayākṣayo nāma bodhisatvānāṃ vimokṣaḥ /  tatra yuṣmābhiḥ śikṣitavyam /
tgt_original: 「有盡無盡解脫法門，汝等當學。

src_original: kṣayam ucyate saṃskṛtam,
tgt_original: 謂有為法。

src_original: akṣayam asaṃskṛtam /
tgt_original: 何謂無盡？ 謂無為法。

src_original: tad bodhisatvena saṃskṛtaṃ ca na kṣapayitavyam,  asaṃskṛte ca na pratiṣṭhātavyam /
tgt_original: 如菩薩者，不盡有為、不住無為。

src_original: Vkn 10.17 tatra saṃskṛtasyākṣayatā,
tgt_original: 何謂不盡有為？

src_original: kasyaiṣa īdṛśo gandhaḥ /  āha: eṣām eva ānanda bodhisatvānāṃ sarvaromakūpebhyo gandhaḥ kāyāt pravāti /
tgt_original: 「是彼菩薩毛孔之香」身子亦言： 「我等毛孔亦出是香。

src_original: śāriputro 'py āha:  asmākam apy āyuṣmann ānanda sarvaromakūpebhya īdṛśo gandhaḥ pravāti /  āha: kuto 'sya gandhasya prādurbhāvaḥ /  āha: vimalakīrtinā licchavinā gandhottamakūṭasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetrāt sarvagandhasugandhāl lokadhātor bhojanam ānītam /
tgt_original: 」問其從來，云：

src_original: tad yāvadbhir bhuktaṃ sarveṣām īdṛśo gandhaḥ kāyāt pravāti /
tgt_original: 「食是香飯。

src_original: Vkn 10.5 athāyuṣmān ānando vimalakīrtiṃ bodhisatvam evam āha:  kiyacciraṃ punar eṣa kulaputra gandho 'nuvartiṣyate /
tgt_original: 」阿難問淨名云： 「是香氣住當久如？

src_original: āha: yāvad etad bhojanaṃ na pariṇataṃ bhaviṣyati /
tgt_original: 」維摩詰言： 「至此飯消。

src_original: ānanda āha: kiyaccireṇa punar etad bhojanaṃ pariṇaṃsyati /
tgt_original: 」曰： 「此飯久如當消？

src_original: āha: saptabhiḥ saptāhaiḥ pariṇaṃsyati /  upari cāsya saptāham ojaḥ sphariṣyati /
tgt_original: 」曰： 「此飯勢力至于七日然後乃消。

src_original: na cājīrṇadoso bhaviṣyati /  Vkn 10.6 yaiś ca bhadantānanda bhikṣubhir anavakrāntaniyāmair etad bhojanaṃ bhuktaṃ teṣām avakrāntaniyāmānāṃ pariṇaṃsyati /
tgt_original: 又阿難！ 若聲聞人未入正位，食此飯者得入正位，然後乃消。 已入正位，得心解脫。

src_original: yair utpāditabodhicittair bhuktaṃ teṣāṃ nāpratilabdhakṣāntikānāṃ pariṇaṃsyati /  yaiḥ punaḥ pratilabdhakṣāntikair bhuktaṃ teṣām ekajātipratibaddhānāṃ pariṇaṃsyati /
tgt_original: 若未發大乘之意，至發意乃消。 已發意，得無生忍。

src_original: Vkn 3.34 so 'haṃ bhagavaṃs tau bhikṣū dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayāmi /
tgt_original: 』我即為其如法解說。

src_original: tat tāvat kauṣṭhagataṃ na pariṇamati yāvan na sarvagataṃ viṣam apagataṃ bhavati /
tgt_original: 已得無生忍，至一生補處。

src_original: tataḥ paścāt tad bhaiṣajyaṃ pariṇamati /
tgt_original: 」皆有「食此飯者」，「然後乃消」。

src_original: athāyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat:  buddhakṛtyaṃ bhagavan etad bhojanaṃ karoti /
tgt_original: 因即致問，阿難白佛言： 「未曾有也。 世尊！ 如此香飯能作佛事。

src_original: āha: evam etad ānanda evam etad yathā vadasi /
tgt_original: 」佛言： 「如是如是。 阿難！

src_original: Vkn 10.8 santy ānanda buddhakṣetrāṇi yeṣu bodhisatvā buddhakṛtyaṃ kurvanti /  santi buddhakṣetrāṇi yeṣu bodhivṛkṣo buddhakṛtyaṃ karoti /  santi buddhakṣetrāṇi yeṣu tathāgatalakṣaṇarūpadarśanaṃ buddhakṛtyaṃ karoti /
tgt_original: 或有佛土，以佛光明而作佛事，有以諸菩薩而作佛事，有以佛所化人而作佛事，有以菩提樹而作佛事，有以佛衣服臥具而作佛事，有以飲食而作佛事，有以園林臺觀而作佛事，有以三十二相、八十隨形好而作佛事。

src_original: Vkn 10.9 evaṃ svapnapratibhāsadakacandrapratiśrutkāmāyāmarīcyupamopanyāsākṣaravibhaktinirdeśāḥ satvānāṃ buddhakṛtyaṃ kurvanti /  santi buddhakṣetrāṇi yatrākṣaravijñaptir buddhakṛtyaṃ karoti /  santy ānanda buddhakṣetrāṇi tādṛśāni pariśuddhāni yatrānudāhāratāpravyāhāratānirdeśatānabhilāpyatā teṣāṃ satvānāṃ buddhakṛtyaṃ karoti /
tgt_original: 有以夢幻影響、鏡中像、水中月、熱時炎如是等喻而作佛事，有以音聲語言文字而作佛事，或有清淨佛土寂寞無言無說、無示無識、無作無為而作佛事。

src_original: Vkn 10.10 na kaścid ānanda īryāpatho na kaścid upabhogo yo buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ satvavinayāya buddhakṛtyaṃ na karoti /
tgt_original: 如是阿難！ 諸佛威儀進止諸所施為，無非佛事。

src_original: vimalakīrtiś ca licchavis taṃ pradeśam anuprāptaḥ sa mām etad avocat:
tgt_original: 時維摩詰來謂我言：

src_original: mā bhadantopāle etau bhikṣū āgāḍhīkārṣīḥ,  vinodayānayor āpattim,  mā āvilīkārṣīḥ /
tgt_original: 『唯優波離！ 無重增此二比丘罪，當直除滅勿擾其心。

src_original: na hi bhadantopāle āpattir adhyātmapratiṣṭhitā na bahirdhāsaṃkrānto nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate /
tgt_original: 所以者何？ 彼罪性不在內、不在外、不在中間。

src_original: tat kasmād dhetoḥ /  uktaṃ hi bhagavatā cittasaṃkleśāt satvāḥ saṃkliśyante cittavyavadānād viśudhyante /
tgt_original: 如佛所說，心垢故眾生垢，心淨故眾生淨。

src_original: cittaṃ ca bhadantopāle nādhyātmapratiṣṭhitaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate /
tgt_original: 心亦不在內、不在外、亦不在中間。

src_original: yathā cittaṃ tathāpattiḥ,  yathāpattis tathā sarvadharmāḥ,  tathatāṃ na vyativartante /
tgt_original: 如其心然，罪垢亦然，諸法亦然，不出於如。

src_original: yā bhadantopāle cittasya prakṛtir yayā cittaprakṛtyā bhadantasya cittaṃ vimuktam,  kiṃ jātu sā cittaprakṛtiḥ saṃkliṣṭā /
tgt_original: 如優波離以心相得解脫時，寧有垢不？

src_original: āha: no hidam /
tgt_original: 』我言： 『不也。 』維摩詰言：

src_original: āha: tatprakṛtikāni bhadantopāle sarvasatvānāṃ cittāni /
tgt_original: 『一切眾生心相無垢，亦復如是。

src_original: Vkn 3.35 saṃkalpo bhadantopāle kleśaḥ /  akalpāvikalpā ca prakṛtiḥ /  viparyāsaḥ saṃkleśaḥ,
tgt_original: 唯優波離！

src_original: Vkn 3.51 tat kathaṃ tvaṃ maitreya vyākṛtas tathatotpādena tathatānirodhena vā /  na ca tathatotpadyate na nirudhyate,  na nirotsyate /
tgt_original: 為從如滅得授記耶？ 若以如生得授記者，如無有生； 若以如滅得授記者，如無有滅。

src_original: yā ca sarvasatvānāṃ tathatā,  yā ca sarvadharmāṇāṃ tathatā,  saiva maitreyasyāpi tathatā /
tgt_original: 一切眾生皆如也，一切法亦如也，眾聖賢亦如也，至於彌勒亦如也。

src_original: evaṃ yadi tvaṃ vyākṛtaḥ sarvasatvā api vyākṛtā bhavanti /
tgt_original: 若彌勒得授記者，一切眾生亦應授記。

src_original: tat kasmād dhetoḥ /
tgt_original: 所以者何？

src_original: na hi tathatā dvayaprabhāvitā nānātvaprabhāvitā /
tgt_original: 夫如者不二不異。

src_original: Vkn 1.15 atha buddhānubhāvenāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyaitad abhavat:
tgt_original: 爾時舍利弗承佛威神，作是念言：

src_original: yadi yādṛśī cittapariśuddhis tādṛśī bodhisatvasya buddhakṣetrapariśuddhiḥ saṃbhavati,  tan mā āhaiva bhagavataḥ śākyamuner bodhisatvacaryāṃ carataś cittam apariśuddhaṃ yenedaṃ buddhakṣetram evam apariśuddhaṃ saṃdṛśyate /  atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāyāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:  tat kiṃ manyase,  śāriputra mā āhaiva sūryācandramasāv apariśuddhau yaj jātyandho na paśyati /  āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavan jātyandhāparādha eṣa na sūryacandramasoḥ /  āha: evam eva śāriputra satvānām ajñānāparādha eṣa yas tathāgatasya buddhakṣetraguṇālaṃkāravyūhaṃ kecit satvā na paśyanti,
tgt_original: 「若菩薩心淨則佛土淨者，我世尊本為菩薩道時意豈不淨？

src_original: na tatra tathāgatasyāparādhaḥ /  pariśuddhaṃ hi śāriputra tathāgatasya buddhakṣetraṃ yūyaṃ punar idaṃ na paśyatha /
tgt_original: 而是佛土不淨若此。

src_original: Vkn 1.17 atha bhagavān pādāṅguṣṭhena imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ parāhanti sma /
tgt_original: 」爾時世尊即以足指案地，即時三千大千世界若干百千眾寶莊嚴土。
